main event: A witness observed a moving object with a flashing light in the southern sky while driving home on the Capitol Beltway on February 13, 1966.
interesting points: The object was observed at a high altitude and moved at a very rapid rate.,The object hovered for a short time before suddenly accelerating and disappearing.,It appeared circular in shape, not quite saucer-like, but very large, around 50 to 75 feet in diameter.,The object was surrounded by a bright glow that pulsated, and it was completely silent.,The characteristics did not resemble those of an aircraft or satellite.
sighted object: a large, circular object with flashing lights
